title: Simon Baynes – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Simon Baynes, the Conservative MP for Clwyd South, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
I am backing Rishi Sunak in the leadership election: he has the energy, experience and compassion to be an outstanding Prime Minister.
  *[NHSPRB]: NHS Pay Review Body
